    • Method Detail

      • apply

        CDocument apply(String master,
              String namespace,
              CDocument document)
        Applies a trained ITag model to the given document.
        Before this can be called, an ITag model must have been trained by calling ITagTrainerService.train(String, String) or ITagTrainerService.train(String, String, boolean) with the same master and namespace.

        The method returns a CDocument with the predictions added as TagMatches. The identifiers of the TagMatches are structured in the same way as described in setTrainingDocuments().
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the model to use
        namespace - identification of the model to use
        document - the document for which entities should be predicted.
        Returns:
        a document with predictions added as TagMatches.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no model is present. A new ITag model can be trained by calling ITagTrainerService.train(String, String) or ITagTrainerService.train(String, String, boolean)

      • retrieveTagMatches

        List<TagMatch> retrieveTagMatches(String master,
                                String namespace,
                                CDocument document)
        Applies a trained ITag model to the given document.
        Before this can be called, an ITag model must have been trained by calling ITagTrainerService.train(String, String) or ITagTrainerService.train(String, String, boolean) with the same master and namespace.

        The method returns the predictions as TagMatches. The identifiers of the TagMatches are structured in the same way as described in setTrainingDocuments().
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the model to use
        namespace - identification of the model to use
        document - the document for which entities should be predicted.
        Returns:
        the list predictions as tag matches.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if no model is present. A new ITag model can be trained by calling ITagTrainerService.train(String, String) or ITagTrainerService.train(String, String, boolean)
